Itemized Passive Description:
*Basic effect(s)*
- ATK & DEF 180%{passiveImg:up_g}
- "Terrifying Conquerors" or "Planetary Destruction"
Category allies' Ki +3 and ATK & DEF 50%{passiveImg:up_g}
*Per "Terrifying Conquerors" or "Planetary Destruction"
Category ally on the team (depending on which Category has
more members)*
- Ki +1 (up to +5)
- ATK 10%{passiveImg:up_g} (up to 50%)
- Damage reduction rate 10%{passiveImg:up_g} (up to 50%)
*When attacking with 12 or more Ki*
- ATK & DEF 100%{passiveImg:up_g}
- An additional ATK 50%{passiveImg:up_g} when there is an "Earth-Bred
Fighters" Category enemy
*When the target enemy is in the following status: {passiveImg:atk_down} or {passiveImg:stun}*
- Ki +6
- Attacks are effective against all Types
*When attacking with 20 or more Ki*
- Attacks are effective against all Types
*When attacking with 24 Ki*
- Performs a critical hit
- Launches an additional Super Attack

5807.superDescription:
Raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn and 
causes colossal damage with 
a high chance of stunning the enemy

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!

5808.superDescription:
Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn and 
causes mega-colossal damage with 
a great chance of stunning the enemy

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!

or starting from the 8th turn from 
the start of battle (up to 2 times)
